reasoning: Crohn's disease incidence ~6-8 per 100k person-years with prevalence ~80 per 100k in developed countries. Peak onset in 20-40 year age group. Based on multiple epidemiological studies and disease registries.
source: Loftus EV Jr. (2004). Clinical epidemiology of inflammatory bowel disease: Incidence, prevalence, and environmental influences. Gastroenterology. 126(6):1504-1517
